attributes.action: Request an Intervention and support to the people of Burma
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This petition has been set up to encourage the British Government to push for an intervention to help secure the people of Burma their right set down in the Universal Declaration of Human Rights.
Thank you for your support

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
